name: Dunsparce

evolution.description: Dunsparce can evolve into Dudunsparce at level 10 and above while knowing Hyper Drill. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Land Snake Pokémon. Dunsparce has a drill for its tail. It uses this tail to burrow into the ground backward. This Pokémon is known to make its nest in complex shapes deep under the ground.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.description: The Move DC to pass a saving throw against one of this Pokémon's moves is increased by 1.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be the target of an attack of opportunity.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a damaging Dark, Bug, or Ghost move, it makes its next attack at advantage.
